0.2.name: wordpress/just-one-category
0.2.description: Just One Category will cause WordPress to display on a category archive page only those posts which are direct members of that category, i.e. this plugin will exclude from that category page all posts which belong to any of that category's subcategories but do not belong to the category itself.
